title: Location of Stories in Runeterra?
body:
This is a question more for the Developers of the LOL universe page than anything; but I was wondering where in Ionia does the Broken Blade story-line take place?
More specifically:
   -where is the farm that riven lives?
   -where is the village in which she is held trial?
   -where is the temple that Elder Sama is killed?

replies.body: Riot needs to place all the past stories on the map page, so that we can visualize where it all happened.
Agreed. I am currently trying to get as much details as I can. Just hope they respond.

I did some job locating stories when the map came out: 

> **First part**: [Shurima](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/vfPutJLE-the-stories-of-shurima)
>  **Second part**: [Demacia](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/bwH7fjVy-mapping-the-stories-ii-demacia)
> **Third Part**: [Noxus](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/MiVkXtAZ-mapping-the-stories-iii-noxus)

I pretend to do what's left when I return from my holidays in September. First Ionia, then probably (if we have new updated lore) Freljord.
I'm sorry I am a little confused. What so you mean?
